Desc.eng: Stranger! We are trapped in this diabolical machine, help!
A talking cat? What the hell is going on here?
We were kidnapped by mad scientists and put in this contraption called the Mind Modulator. It switches minds between bodies. Aargh, I bit the inside of my cheek again!
I hate this puny sack of blood and meat! Give me my claws and teeth back!
Poor things, they got their souls ripped out and stuffed into another body. Admirably creative.
We cannot be released until the Ghost Capacitor is replaced in the machine! You should be able to find a fresh one around the lab. Hurry!
That is all I need to know. Hang in there!
I refuse to touch this hellish machine, sorry.
